name: Time To Slime (Galilei Games)
description:
Time To Slime is an adventure platformer. 

In this game you have to play as a slime and try to get out of the cave. Unusual traps and the final boss await you. 

The creation of the game was inspired by anime "That time I got reincarnated as a slime".

To play you must download zip archive and execute TimeToSlime.exe.
